title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 595 - Releases Of Hazardous Substances (Repealed)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 595 - Releases Of Hazardous Substances (Repealed)

State Regulations

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. E, pt. 595

Repealed

New

York State Register September 30, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 39, eff. 10/11/2015

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§
3-0301[1][m], 3- 0301[2][m], 17-0303, 37-0105, 40-0111 and
40-0113

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
